expo.name: Full Stack Apprenticeship Mobile
expo.description: The home for the Full-Stack Apprenticeship (FSA), designed to help you refresh your life with a new career, a fresh mindset, and a new community to grow with. The apprenticeship provides the structure and accountability of a coding bootcamp, without charging you an arm and a leg. Our platform gasifies the process of learning and building full-stack applications, making for a social and fun experience. Also includes is a 60 page ebook describing the process of becoming a self-taught full-stack developer, along with a curated Knowledge Base that details the FSA Technical Standard and its accompanying tools, skillset and frameworks. The Technical Standard is designed for new developers to learn a stack that will set them up for financial and technical success, focusing on React Web + Native, Node.js, serverless deployments & AWS for infrastructure provisioning.
